"...Treasure Hoarders are in some trouble. It seems that they've lost their Weasel Thieves (?). Those who are still in The Chasm, please stay calm and wait."
"...There has been an earthquake, which caused much panic among the Treasure Hoarders. They didn't deliver the food today..."
"...Someone seems to have dispelled the Seven-Star Array. I need more information..."
"...Clitopho, our contact from the Treasure Hoarders, went missing. As a result, our supplies are cut off for now..."

"Onions, mushrooms, ginger, garlic, soybeans, lettuce, wild boar meat, pepper, salt... Amounts... as we can spare them..."
"...And use some Wolfhooks, Valberries, Clitopho's whole stock, use it all! And maybe some of those weird mushrooms we got from down there... and whatever else that's got taste..."
"...Make sure the bones have been picked clean, and don't leave any bits that might get caught on the teeth while we're eating the meat!"

"...The third attempt at creating a cannonball fuse has failed. Fortunately, there were no explosions... But the issue remains the same: the reactant concentration is not up to par, and so no explosion can be possible..."
"...The third camp needs a batch of chilled drinks, and our Wolfhook stores are running low. This is quite odd. We'll have to count on our brothers in Mondstadt to deliver once again..."
"The fourth attempt at making fuses has failed. We discovered that Unmoving Essential Oil bottles can be adapted for use as the Safe Blasting Device's fuse. We could give that a shot..."
"...Clitopho has gone missing, and he's made off with our formula to boot! Erge's hopping mad. Looks like someone's about to be in hot stew."

"...Excuse my lack of graces, but please, old man, you're getting on in years, and your eyes and legs are both not what they used to be... Stop following us young lads up and down the mines..."
"Things haven't been looking too good recently, but some of us have scrounged up some Mora for you. Should be enough for you to get out of the business. With your artisanship, you should be able to find decent work in Liyue Harbor and never have to worry about making ends meet in your old age..."
"...Don't worry 'bout us! The lads have all grown up. We can handle ourselves. Please, old man, just take this as a little somethin' from us to you..."
"Brass Bull Zhao"
"Some guests from the 'Fadui' will be showing up to make a deal later. Make sure you all look sharp! We want to make a good impression!"

(All sorts of expenditures are scribbled here. It seems that the Treasure Hoarders have recently fallen on hard times.)
(It seems that the "jade workshop" was the primary culprit in this. From three months ago, all ore delivered to that place have vanished from the records like smoke, never to be turned into income of any kind.)
(The final page has no data on it, but it does depict, in a scrawling hand, a large, strong bull snorting angrily as it stomps on a Sweet Flower.)

"The myriad mountains of Tianheng are a trove of a thousand treasures, for deep within the rocks bounteous jade gleams gloriously. Yet, sinister forces now beset the Chasm; its glorious gems are hidden and their crimson glow gone. The road to the retrieval of riches is rife with ruin... perilous is the path to the procurement of precious elixirs..."
"Wherefore did I immediately proceed to discuss this predicament with all Yuehai Pavilion, that they might vote on the fate of mining activities at the Chasm. Their verdict today was that it is inadvisable to continue, and all activity should cease immediately. Let it be known to all: eschew lust for riches and instead pine for a better tomorrow; be drawn not to noctilucous glow, but instead set your gaze on the perfect guidance of fate and time."

"...About the feeding schedule for Weasel Thieves..."
"...Amateur Weasel Thief: Feed after noon to keep their excessive energy in check... Recommended Time: <color=#37ffff>12:00–23:59</color> "
"...Hoarder Weasel Thief: Feed before noon to allow a more flexible training schedule... Recommended Time: <color=#37ffff>2:00–11:59</color> "
"...Golden Weasel Thief: The most cunning of all. Limit its feeding and interacting window within two hours... Recommended Time: <color=#37ffff>0:00–1:59</color> "
"All Weasel Thieves listed above can be summoned during their respective feeding hours. Stand on a large rock and summon them by whistling. Avoid whistling for fun, as it may lead to unnecessary trouble!"
"...By Erge. Weasel Thief Trainer on Duty This Month: Clitopho... Scheduled Days: 31 (Late: 27)..."

"...The dragon-king traversed the mountains, and the hills collapsed with a sigh... Vishaps and other beasts stalked the wide glaze-plains..."
"...Rex Lapis called upon the people in haste, and we must not tarry for all the profit in the world... I too shall come forth, armor, bow, and all..."
"...We shall sacrifice ourselves for the nation, though our chances of returning be slim. Let the mourners mourn! Death shall be our home..."

"This is a relic from battles of old that Rex Lapis bequeathed unto us. As such, please stick by the various safety guidelines. Do not make any ruckus around it or forcibly move it. If any accidents happen due to such tomfoolery, let the blood be on your own head!"
"Most of the engineering platforms and the related machinery have been dismantled. All involved personnel, please return to the surface to await further instructions."

(This announcement has been torn in half, rendering only a fraction of its text readable.)
"Three batches of Lumenspar... Huishan Hall... release after passing inspection..."
"...Researchers, please return immediately after obtaining Lumenstone Adjuvant samples... seal the mining tunnels once you have confirmed that it is safe to do so..."

"...The elemental reactions within The Chasm have, over its long history, turned the soil a wondrous violet-red..."
"...The Glazed Sand Crystal that can be gathered and processed from within has an almost unearthly, lovely luster to it..."
"...The tradition of processing Glazed Sand Crystal has played a massive part in the fame that Liyue's porcelain goods have won..."

My dear elder sister Katya,
I heard the Captain say that they were going to transfer you to our regiment. My heart brims with joy at the thought of our reunion!
I've always carried the balalaika you gave me around, doing a bit of repairing here and a bit of mending there. After replacing the frets we'd previously broken, the balalaika sounds much more natural now.
But just for the record, since you asked me to keep it, I'm not gonna give it back to you! If my clumsy sister should damage this old pal of mine once more, I won't go through the trouble of repairing it again!
Oh right, I recently learned two new songs. Wait to be impressed when you report in — let me play the songs to you by the bonfire, just like in the old days when we would sing to the melody of balalaika, giggle at the jokes we share, and look forward to the precious gifts from the Tsaritsa to our brothers and sisters in the House of the Hearth in celebration of a new year...
What's different, however, is that we're no longer carefree children. With greater responsibilities on our shoulders come heavier loads on our minds.
The Captain granted a half-day pass especially for us. Don't forget to bring your liquor and desserts. Let's booze it up and talk it out! I've so many stories to share with you. I believe you too have had quite an adventure where you were previously deployed!
By the way, don't laugh at me if you notice that I've put on some weight! I'll also keep an eye on your "horizontal development"!
I look forward to meeting you.
Nikolay Snezhevich

"...The people from Liyue have left their large cannon behind. It shows signs of maintenance. It seems that they have not given up on re-opening the mine..."
"...Scouted the area where the crystal fragment was found, clearing a path for others to follow, before returning here to await further orders..."
"...The sonic catcher is reacting to a greater pulse coming from deeper within the mine... It is a grand, but dull noise..."
"...According to sample analysis, the crystal may be older than The Chasm itself. However, we have not found any systemic signs of ancient civilizations nearby..."

"...The sonic catcher is constantly blaring. It almost reminds me of Sergeant Anton's old grandmother's snoring... We can't use it as-is..."
"...I'm going to call it the 'Babushka,' I think. This issue might have been caused by the radiation from the crystal itself and the influence of that black matter..."
"...I do not have the spare parts to repair the 'Babushka,' so it has to be disassembled. Sorry, grandma. Setting up camp here and awaiting resupply."
"...It seems that someone is observing us from a vantage point nearby. Spotted an unnatural flash. A telescope (or perhaps the scope of a rifle?) Either way, we have to move..."

"...Specialist Bogdana has discovered that the black-colored mud is still constantly propagating. We have to move more swiftly than before..."
"...The anomalous shifts in The Chasm's underground have been gradually increasing in speed. We have to bring the Mokosh Device to the bottom for assembly as soon as possible..."
"...Sergeant Anton reports that a woman has been following us around. We might need to set up some traps and early warning systems..."

"...An explosion has occurred. Cause unknown. The Mokosh Device, which should have theoretically been able to clear the Abyssal corruption from this place, has overloaded and been destroyed..."
"...The black pollutant on the main fragment has begun to regenerate... We need to sum up what we've learned thus far..."
"...One or several hard strikes aimed at key stress points on the main fragment can cause the black matter to retreat..."
"...Our scouting parties have discovered human activity in different locations. Whether they are human or some other creature is unclear... But perhaps they might even be the culprits behind the black matter's propagation..."

(A miner's log, with the name "He" on its cover — probably the name of the owner.)
(On the first few pages, it reads:)
"Qi Ding's been looking for his daughter's toy, but it's nowhere to be found. Lemme go deeper into the mine and see if I can find it for him..."
"...There's an itching in my ears..."
"...It's so itchy, like bugs in my ears... Ugh, it just won't give me a rest. I'm gonna run out of food soon. According to that voice, I... Huh. But is this mushroom really edible?"
On the following pages, it reads: "I can hear it. Hee-hee, mushroom meat... hee-hee... mushroom meat. So delicious... Hahaha, mushroom meat..."

"...This Clitopho fellow is not to be trusted! He left the group that went up to steal food to rot, and he let all the Weasel Thieves go free..."
"...We've locked him up, awaiting Erge's judgment..."
"...By the way, there was an earthquake previously, and some people came down here afterward. Everyone should be on high alert..."

"...We made the acquaintance of a few new companions down there, and they're requesting a few boxes of things to eat and drink. Now, we can't leave any new companions to starve just like that (especially when they've got the Mora to fork up in exchange), so could someone get them what they need quickly?..."
"...Also, this should give that new guy called Clitopho — you know, the fake medicine man — something to do. I'm pretty sure the mine warehouses store some food and drink."
"...We've already sent one batch of people. What's with the lack of reply, huh?"

"Please take note!"
"The Chasm has been closed indefinitely. All blasting tools have been sealed within this storehouse. If you do not procure both the two necessary keys simultaneously, this gate will not open."
"The fuses and cannonballs have been placed separately to prevent any accidents from occurring!"

(An aged diary. The pages bear some strange purple-black burn marks.)
"...The excavation team shall be disbanded today, and once the collected data has been properly organized, it shall be handed over to the messenger from Huishan Hall tomorrow. Additionally, we have found that the office door has been opened three times. It may be the work of Treasure Hoarders, so everyone must stay on alert..."
"The detailed data has been sent to the secretary at Yujing Terrace such that the long-term implications for the Chasm may be estimated... A strange black mud-like substance was also discovered..."
"...Purple-black mud... below... people... something came through the crack in the door..."

"We, the Chasm Exploration Team, have made this place our temporary base camp. All members, please pay attention to act within safety parameters at all times. Do not act alone without permission, and do not touch any unknown materials within the depths of The Chasm!"

"Recently, we have discovered an unknown black mud-like substance in part of the main mining area. It is exceedingly dangerous. All spelunkers must be on double guard. Be sure to avoid areas tainted by this substance. If you have any questions, please ask Zhiqiong to show you the way around."
"Taliesin's shoes have gotten wet. Could we ask the resupply team to send down some changes of clothes and shoes?"
"Also, Jinwu needs a set of backup tools with which to process the Lumenstone Adjuvants. Could the resupply team please send these over as soon as possible? Thanks!"
(This half-torn sheet of paper is filled with complex mathematical workings and geometry. They seem to have something to do with astrology...)

"The 'Mountainator' cannon within the main mining area seems to remain undamaged. We should be able to use this to open up a path and save ourselves significant amounts of time exploring this place."
"However, we need to first clear the area of roving bandits. Fortunately, there's good news: the Millelith are already on the move cutting off their links with Treasure Hoarders on the surface."
"If their connection to the surface is cut, the Treasure Hoarders underground will likely fall back of their own accord..."
"We need more supplies of vegetables. Also, having stayed down here without sunlight for too long, everyone needs eggs, mushrooms, and fish to keep themselves nourished."

(This notice is very old indeed. It seems to have been put up by miners well before the exploration team ever arrived on the scene.)
"The mines are a sprawling, complex place. Ensure that you carry a finch cage with you at all times while navigating any narrow spaces within in case of any leakage of poisonous or flammable gasses! Do not forget what our comrade Erge taught us!"

(The edges of this incomplete sheet of paper have been charred a deep brown. It seems that someone read this under torchlight without keeping a safe distance...)
"All miners have been equipped with specialized crystal lamps, so please do not bring flaming torches down into the mines. Additionally, professionals will direct you as to where you might start a fire. Please do not strike camp by yourself if you are unfamiliar with the terrain..."

"Please observe strict order while you disperse. Take your personal belongings with you and do not panic. Once the signal arrives from the surface, you may start leaving gradually in small groups!"
"As for all those who have gone too near to the 'crystal fragment,' please report to the medical team immediately, regardless of whether you had a negative reaction or not, and leave The Chasm as soon as possible!"
"Comrades, please do not panic and follow the higher-ups' announcements!"

(This announcement and the messages written under it have been partially covered by newer notices. This might have been put up not long after the mines were sealed.)
"After the 'crystal fragment' was discovered, the amount of Lumenstone Ore present increased rapidly. As for its benefits or potential risks, we require the exploration team to further confirm them..."

(This old namelist seems to have been left here by the very first exploration team sent after the mine was sealed.)
"We would like to invite the following professional staff to set up camp here to take samples, do research and learn how we might appropriately utilize Lumenstone:"
"...Deputy Research Director, Jinwu. Experiment Assistant, Azadi... Explorers, He Zhi, He Wei..."

"Watch out for falling rocks!"
"Watch your step!"
"Don't slip and fall!"
(A picture of a person plunging into the depths is crudely drawn on the notice board.)
"Stay safe while you use heavy machinery!"
"Do not use any heavy machinery to move the Lumenspar discovered in the depths of The Chasm!"
This is the engineering operations center. All uninvolved personnel, please stay out!

"...The areas in which Lumenstone growths appear are still expanding. It's almost like it is spreading. The raw Lumenspar itself is not harmful, but as it is being formed, it will absorb valuable ore nearby and cause the ore to undergo changes..."
"...At this rate, this ore will seriously devalue and affect the production of all the others. We urge Huishan Hall to dispatch specialists to investigate the properties and function of this ore and fashion a long-term plan..."

"The 'Spiritstones' and 'Wishstones' that the miners whisper about are legends derived from a mysterious crystal that grows in the depths of The Chasm."
"The samples we have retrieved are very clearly different from most ore that can be found in Teyvat. They seem to be capable of changing the material structure of their surroundings. Perhaps this has to do with the ancient legend of the 'heavenly star' that plunged into The Chasm..."
"...Or perhaps that same 'heavenly star' that sleeps in The Chasm might still be deeper within the earth, awaiting discovery...?"

"Low lamp post, high-frequency flicker."
"Middle lamp post, low-frequency flicker."
"High lamp post, low-frequency flicker."

"...Emergency Announcement from the Secretary at Yujing Terrace: The malignant and destructive incident recently occurring at the Jade Chamber has proved that the Fatui are dangerous and untrustworthy..."
"...The collaboration agreement with Snezhnaya has been nullified. The Liyue Qixing will take over the exploration of The Chasm..."
"...The Millelith shall not make contact with any member of the Fatui. Violation of this rule will result in immediate arrest without clemency!"
"Due to the recent incident, all supply stations built for collaborative purposes will be shut down permanently. All Millelith personnel, clerks, and miners stationed there, please leave soon!"
"Members of the Fatui spotted in this area will be arrested as enemies. Please stay alert!"

"The light is fading... My crystal lamp should last for another 4 hours..."
"...There's not much food left. I should be able to find the water filter from memory, but we must find a new source of light..."
"Huh, those lights are floating... or are they walking? Am I starting to see things due to a lack of oxygen?"

"Some strange black magma is oozing out of the depths of the earth. I'm not sure if calling it 'magma' is precise... But it looks very ominous. Best not to get near it..."
"...I went deeper still and retrieved some strange mushrooms. I'm not certain if they are edible or not..."
"...The 'magma' seems to have attracted some elemental lifeforms. Now, if they can eat it, perhaps I could too..."
"...No, something's wrong. Something's gone wrong with those little things. I'd better leave. This is surely not to be taken for sustenance..."
"...once you get used to it, mushrooms actually don't taste too bad. It might be best to relocate to a spot where mushrooms might be found and to make camp there..."

"...When I get too near to the black magma, my thoughts grow jumbled and my senses become agitated. But when I stand close to these crystals, these deleterious effects retreat greatly..."
"...I once heard Little Jinwu say that some... 'Adjuvant' thing can be used to store energy from these crystals. I should ask her about that when I get back to the surface..."
"...My ears itch. I can hear someone calling out to me, telling me that there is water in the depths. Mushrooms..."
"...Oh dear. I fear that I must be going quite insane..."

"Due to the recent incident, all supply stations built for collaborative purposes will be shut down permanently. All Millelith personnel, clerks, and miners stationed there, please leave soon!"
"Members of the Fatui spotted in this area will be arrested as enemies. Please stay alert!"

(This stone tablet looks a fair bit more recent than the rest of the ruins. It seems to have been set up not long ago.)
(Although the inscription cannot be understood per se, a little observation reveals that the engraving is a map of the surrounding area.)
(The tablet is also engraved with some complex pictures that have something to do with the giant crystal suspended before you...)

Craven trespassers... the majestic one's dark curse... is inescapable...
...In death... there is awakening...

textualResearch.title: Edgetho, Breaker of the Oath of Silence

desc.text:
...Companion of that tyrant, "fate," the traveler known as "calamity"...
...No one remembers... that which has passed away...

...O guest from the false land, it is time to face the truth...!
...Truth voided, justice inverted... O partisan heavens...

Depart! Depart...! The shadow of the omnipresent struggle is not something you can bear!
...The echoes of the end... will never... subside...

...Even the ominous thing that came down from the heavens shall be ours to use...
...Shatter... Shatter... this chaotic illusion... our resurgence... shall not be barred...

textualResearch.title: Rethel, Slain of the Split Bow

desc.text:
Why do you tarry in this place, Traveler? ...There is only death here, only memorials to injustice...
...Void emptiness... everything is... void...

...Who art thou to stop us... We shall cleanse the tainted things from the skies... with sacred blood...!
...The heaven's judgment... the needle of retribution... Never... forget...

...Envoy of the heavens, allow me to greet you — with a vengeance!
...A hollow victory over despair... is the greatest dejection of all...

Enter not, outlander... Do not disturb the sleeping stone from the heavens...
...You... do not belong here...
